name: The Robot Demon
description:
I have tried to create what would be my first published video game from the doll of a small child.

The Robot Demon lives with his friend the Ogre in his house in heaven.

Unintentionally the Ogre stumbles, throwing the food he was going to prepare and colliding the pot with the deposit of poop.

All the poop and food is on its way to hell. The Robot Demon must recover the food and be careful not to touch the poop.

The game has 3 levels. Collect the food that falls from the heavens to pass the level.

In some uncertain future I will update it or make a second part of the game.

Enjoy and attention with the poop
